unnormalised: I remember when depression hit me hard back in 2020. My therapist at NIMHANS suggested some mental health apps. It wasn't like *Dear Zindagi* magically fixing things, but slowly, things got better. Practicing mindfulness helped me cope better with my daily life in Bangalore.
